title: Event Step Configuration
description: Event-driven step that subscribes to 'user-registered' and processes new user registrations with comprehensive onboarding workflows.

title: User Profile Creation
description: Creates comprehensive user profiles with preferences, metadata, and segmentation data for new registrations.

title: User Segmentation Updates
description: Updates user segment counts and tracking for analytics and campaign targeting with source-based segmentation.

title: Welcome Email Sequence
description: Initiates welcome email sequences for new users with personalized content and multi-step onboarding campaigns.

title: Referral Campaign Detection
description: Detects referral sources and triggers appropriate thank you campaigns for users coming from referral programs.

title: Registration Analytics
description: Tracks registration analytics with daily metrics, source breakdown, and engagement tracking for business intelligence.
